Articles.Content: Knowing where Xannari would head, cuts her off at the ship entrance, seconds before she would board.

Where's Dark?

- - - Updated - - -

The station is gone! Muahahaha

> 
> Where's Dark?
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> The station is gone! Muahahaha

[We're sticking to reality here]

The Discovery slowly decends into the Great Attractor

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> [We're sticking to reality here]

I fired torpedoes though
Yeah, but we are Still at that point where I cut you off before you could board your ship

> 
> The Discovery slowly decends into the Great Attractor

[And proceeds to be destroyed, as it's power was immeasurable before, and even more so that it has been artificially enhanced in strength]

> 
> Yeah, but we are Still at that point where I cut you off before you could board your ship

[i haven't elected to leave yet]

I enter the Multiverse and again achieve omnipotence.

- - - Updated - - -

Darkness

Light

Nothing

Everything

- - - Updated - - -

Points of light

So small

So insignificant
use the different catwalks to plant devices on several points on the ships hull, then reenters the facility

Existance

- - - Updated - - -

I use my omnipotence to erase all traces of Sampa's personal logs.

- - - Updated - - -

So others don't have to suffer from reading them.

AI, can you keep up with all of this?

I believe so. There's a ton of them, but these are fairly primitive explosive devices. The only problem it they're quite powerful.

Well let me know if it gets out of hand. I'll jump out if we can't do it.
I'm here. Just recording a youtube video in Real life

Seeing several automated guards, I duck into a ventilation duct, eventually finding my way to Xannari's control room, where she still happens to be, and decide to take her by surprise. I detonate the charges I placed all over her ship, destroying it and forcing her to look at the source, and I creep out of the duct
I use my omnipotence to transport Sampa into the Multiverse, thus granting him Omnipotence
Nein! I still have my mission to complete!
But now you have god-like powers to help you
I would rather have normal human abilities, one on one (always hated the idea of fighting a weaker foe while having god-like powers, better to fight using your wits and combat prowess alone)

**To his surprise, Sampa's hand is electrolytically repelled with great force**

Thought you could just leave?

**The assistance of the AI as matched ambient energy resonance with all the explosives, making them not detonate due to them no longer being able to tell their own energy from the energy around them, thus never receiving signal.**

That was a good surprise, I'll give you that.

Then give Xannari omnipotence too!

Big gigantic battle war thing!

- - - Updated - - -

The Discovery arrives at Xannari's station and destroys the life support and the solar panels. The AI can no longer power itself
\*chuckles methodically\* fires sidearm at a gas tank that happens to be at the level the barrel is pointing twice, first to cause it to leak gas, the second to ignite it.

> 
> Then give Xannari omnipotence too!
> Big gigantic battle war thing!
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> The Discovery arrives at Xannari's station and destroys the life support and the solar panels. The AI can no longer power itself

[i'm getting sick of this. I'm gonna leave if people fail to at least know what's going on. A small base, out a distance from the Great Attractor, running on solar panels? Come on, that makes 0 sense. Good luck taking out enough of the base at a time to completely destroy life support. Your weapons can't even scratch the surface!]

> 
> \*chuckles methodically\* fires sidearm at a gas tank that happens to be at the level the barrel is pointing twice, first to cause it to leak gas, the second to ignite it.

[Gas...

Okay, this is just silly

I mean, if I play along, I'll just get the 011s to defend me. If I don't I'm holding you at gunpoint with a new firearm]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T20:35:09Z" title="07/13/2015 08:35  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

> 
> [i'm getting sick of this. I'm gonna leave if people fail to at least know what's going on. A small base, out a distance from the Great Attractor, running on solar panels? Come on, that makes 0 sense. Good luck taking out enough of the base at a time to completely destroy life support. Your weapons can't even scratch the surface!]

(hence why I attempted to attack and destroy it from within)
They're Kinemetic warheads. They can destroy almost anything. I damage the nuclear reactor, causing it to shut down. The AI has power for 10 cycles.
Well, would you like a shot in the shins?
What is the base made of?

[it's a 011 reactor, laced structurally with Quadllneutronium, the most durable alloy I have created! You destroy that somehow, you destroy everything!]

[011 is the most powerful energy source I know to exist, but it can't be weaponized since it is too unstable. As a shield, however, it works all kinds of wonders]

[i'm not explaining this again. I also haven't synthesized enough of the Quadllneutronium to structure the entire base with it, so that's still Poly neutronium. Still strong as all hell though]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T20:41:31Z" title="07/13/2015 08:41  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**
